ProductInfo.Features:
Samsung NX2000 Mirrorless Digital Camera (White) with 20-50mm f/3.5-5.6 Lens (White)
Samsung 50-200mm f/4.0-5.6 ED OIS II Lens (Black)
0.45X Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + 3 Piece Filter Kit (UV-CPL-FLD)
16GB Micro SD Memory Card + SD Adapter + High Speed Memory Card Reader + Extended Life Replacement Battery
Standard Slave Flash + Full Size Tripod + Monopod + Table Top Tripod + LCD Screen Protectors + Cleaning Kit + Carrying Case
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung NX2000 Mirrorless Digital Camera Kit with 20-50mm (White) & 50-200mm f/4.0-5.6 Lenses (Black). Includes 0.45X Wide Angle Lens, 2X Telephoto Lens, 3 Piece Filter Kit (UV-CPL-FLD), 16GB Micro SD Memory Card & Much More!
